text: The Democratic Party () is a centre to centre-right political party in Indonesia. It was founded on 9 September 2001. Their ideology is based on the Indonesian political idea of Pancasila, who identifies as centrist. ==References== Category:2001 establishments in Asia Category:21st-century establishments in Indonesia Category:Political parties in Asia Category:Organizations based in Indonesia Category:Politics of Indonesia Category:Centrist parties
title: Democratic Party (Indonesia)
